title: Light GBM Error:
body:
Hi Scott-

There seems to be an error now with TreeExplainer and LightGBM. 

Shap version: '0.28.5'
LightGBM version: '2.1.2'

```
from scipy.special import expit
np.random.seed(0)
N = 1000
X = pd.DataFrame({
    'continuous': range(N),
    'categorical': np.repeat([0, 1, 2, 3, 4], N / 5)
})
CATEGORICAL_EFFECTS = [-1, -1, -2, -2, 2]
LINEAR_TERM = np.array([
    -0.5 + 0.01 * X['continuous'][k]
    + CATEGORICAL_EFFECTS[X['categorical'][k]] for k in range(X.shape[0])
]) + np.random.normal(0, 1, X.shape[0])
TRUE_PROB = expit(LINEAR_TERM)
Y = np.random.binomial(1, TRUE_PROB, size=N)
DATA = {
    'X': X,
    'probability_labels': TRUE_PROB,
    'binary_labels': Y,

    'lgb_with_binary_labels': lgb.Dataset(X, Y),
    'lgb_with_probability_labels': lgb.Dataset(X, TRUE_PROB),
}

nrounds = 5

params = {
        'objective': 'binary',
        'feature_fraction': 1,
        'bagging_fraction': 1,
        'verbose': -1
    }
gbm = lgb.train(params, DATA['lgb_with_binary_labels'], num_boost_round=nrounds)

explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(gbm)
```

Gives the following Error

```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-10-149c829da605> in <module>()
      4 X=X[X.MO_YR_KEY_NO <=201809]
      5 
----> 6 explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(lgbm_mod)
      7 shap_values = explainer.shap_values(X[keep_vars].drop(['IMC_KEY_NO','MO_YR_KEY_NO'],axis=1).values)
      8 shap.summary_plot(shap_values, X[keep_vars].drop(['IMC_KEY_NO','MO_YR_KEY_NO'],axis=1),max_display=30)

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in __init__(self, model, data, model_output, feature_dependence)
     91         self.feature_dependence = feature_dependence
     92         self.expected_value = None
---> 93         self.model = TreeEnsemble(model, self.data, self.data_missing)
     94 
     95         assert feature_dependence in feature_dependence_codes, "Invalid feature_dependence option!"

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in __init__(self, model, data, data_missing)
    522                 self.trees = None # we get here because the cext can't handle categorical splits yet
    523 
--> 524             self.objective = objective_name_map.get(model.params.get("objective", "regression"), None)
    525             self.tree_output = tree_output_name_map.get(model.params.get("objective", "regression"), None)
    526 

AttributeError: 'Booster' object has no attribute 'params'
```
